content:
https://github.com/pypa/advisory-db has appeared just a few days ago. It appears to have been imported from the existing CVEs by the OSV folks at Google, but will be owned by Python Packaging Authority going forward.
I find it very interesting because the repository structure seems to be closely inspired by RustSec advisory DB!
Imitation is the sincerest form of flattery :grinning_face_with_smiling_eyes:
Yeah, I also told them if they want any advice from our expeiences to let me know (I used to be a python person)
